title: Kenji Wakamatsu
text:
is a Japanese former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He used his name "若松 賢治" until 1994.
Playing career.
Wakamatsu was born in <a href="Kagoshima%20Prefecture">Kagoshima Prefecture</a> on August 16, 1972. After dropping out of <a href="Fukuoka%20University">Fukuoka University</a>, he joined <a href="Sanfrecce%20Hiroshima">Sanfrecce Hiroshima</a> in 1993. He played in the <a href="1993%20J.League%20Cup">1993 J.League Cup</a> as forward instead <a href="Takuya%20Takagi">Takuya Takagi</a>, because Takagi had left the club to play for the <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japanese national team</a>. However, he was unable to play in any other games and he retired at the end of the 1995 season.
